acceptance-test-run.title: Memoization should work for recursive Pojos
acceptance-test-run.name: memoizationShouldWorkForRecursivePojos

test-step.description: Given a Random Data Provider Strategy with memoization set to true
Given a Podam Factory with custom data provider strategy
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.RecursivePojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the two objects should be strictly equal (e.g. according to == operator)
